body:
hey guys,

I was wondering if you guys would be interested in seeing my pvp on youtube, like recording my view of games and such so that you can see my elite pvp skills - LOL NOT - and have some fun with me!

things im looking at getting done before setting up a huge investment in this:
  1. getting a mc intro that I like
  2. figuring out the best way to record and stuff
  3. hype my channul
  4. release bideos

tell me what you guys think :)

replies.body:
can someone help me get good editing software?

i have some ideas but i would like something that i can just pop video into and edit, like after bursts of recording and stuff. but i need the software ;-;

im on a pc fyui
